improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero.  The value of x becomes 0 after the loop, leading to a division by zero error in line 10. Add a check to ensure x is not zero before the division operation.
Unreachable code. The loop iterates 10 times, reducing x to 0. The subsequent line (line 10) will cause a runtime error. The code after the loop is therefore unreachable.
